content.rendered:
Chezacash Review

It is no secret that betting is a “go-to” platform for making money quick. There are those who are lucky and those who are not. In a betting site like chezacash, there are a number of basic features that clients enjoy and are fundamental in making a user experience better. Gamblers like having options. They like knowing that there is a market where they can out their money and make profit. Chezacash offers this option to Kenyan a through their website and even goes further to offer offline matches to those without access to the internet. Offline matches are regarded to be more risky than online ones since you don’t really get to do much research on your bet options. There are a number of additional features that make this betting site stand out from it’s competitors. Before we get to these respective features, it is good you understand what makes up a good betting site. A good site is made up of a user-friendly interface that allows ease of use and makes it possible for clients to make bet selections with ease. Also, a good customer support system is essential for customer satisfaction since they would be able to make inquiries and get prompt feedback. 

Features

One of the standout features of this betting site is their jackpot. They have a jackpot competition where one is free to place a bet with a minimum of Ksh. 10.

Karibu free bet.

 This is a welcoming bonus that is given to each new member. Upon registration, a new member can get a welcoming bonus of up to ksh. 20,000.

Cashback multibet

This is a betting option that allows members to get their money back when they bet on multiple team’s and only one team loses. This is a standout feature that attracts many customers.

Multibet boost .

This is a betting bonus that is given when one decides to bet on multiple teams on one betslip. The conditions to necessitate getting this bonus are that the teams have to collectively have an overall odd of more than 1.6 and most importantly, the maximum amount of stake allowed per let slip is Ksh 20,000. There is no limit on the number of betslips one is allowed to have. However, if a match happens to be postponed or one fails to make accurate predictions, one cannot get this bonus.

VUTA FRIEND bonus.

This is a referral bonus which is given to any member who invites a friend to join chezacash and places a bet. This bonus is usually a meagre Ksh 30 and has conditions along with it. The first condition to receiving this bonus is that the newly invited member ought to create an account, deposit money and place a bet. As for the recipient of the free bet, one might to place a bet of already 5 teams. Each of these teams has to have a minimum of 1.5 odds.

To invite a friend , one has to to SMS WIN#0723,XXX.XXX. Here, WIN happens to be the registration command while # is the separator.  0723 XXX,XXX is the invited friend’s number.  

Jackpot

With regards to their jackpot, the chezacash jackpot is composed of a total of 18 teams where one is able to make a jackpot attempt with a minimum of Ksh10. This is quite appealing since anyone can try their luck without any fear of losing.

Sports to bet on

Football

Basketball

Tennis

Handball

Volleyball

Darts

Boxing

Snooker

Futsal

Badminton

Aussie rules

Cycling

Ice hockey

Rugby

Cricket

Registration

Online registration.

Registering on this site is quite easy, you only have to log into www.Chezacash.com on your browser,click Register and you will then be required to fill in your personal details. After this, you will then click on Create account. You can save your pin elsewhere or memorize it to make sure you don’t forget.

Pros

Free bets available

Huge Deposit bonuses

Multiple matches to bet on

Live betting option

SMS betting option

Provides for two mobile wallets Mpesa and Airtel money

Easy to use website

Friends’ bonus

Cons

Low publicity (less popular)

Minimum free bet amounts

Withdrawal fee

Takes a long time to load

No cashout

No casino

No virtual games

Payment options.

In order to deposit money into your account, the Paybill number to use is 290030

Changing pin.

Changing your pin on this platform is quite easy, you only have to Log into your account and select the “Reset pin” option on your account. For those using the SMS option, this can be done by sending CHANGEPIN#XXXX #YYYY to 29030. Here, XXXX is your current pin while YYYY is your new pin.

See here more reviews of top betting site like Lucky2u
